description.summary: get a dde shell surface bind to a wayland surface

request.name: get_geometry
request.description: reques windo geometry, will notify by "geometry" event.

request.name: request_active
request.description: request to activate current shell if it's not active

request.name: set_state
request.description:
Set window state.
Values for state argument are described by dde_shell.state and can be used together in a bitfield. The flags bitfield describes which flags are supposed to be set, the state bitfield the value for the set flags

event.name: geometry
event.description: Send geometry to client everytime the window geometry changed

event.name: state_changed
event.description:
This event will be sent as soon as the window state changes.
Values for state argument are described by dde_shell.state.

event.name: splitable
event.description: This event will be sent as soon as the window splitable.

request.name: set_property
request.description:
Set window property.
Values for property argument are described by dde_shell.property and can be used together in a bitfield. The flags bitfield describes which property are supposed to be set.
